message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I think it's a great deal and will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $125? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $110. This price reflects my budget constraints while still acknowledging the value of the product.
